results.content: Clear and logical lessons, easy to understand and good audio quality (a must for me:-) Fundamental Socket io Websocket lessons. Enough to get started with the instructors easy to follow approach.
results.content_html: Clear and logical lessons, easy to understand and good audio quality (a must for me:-) Fundamental Socket io Websocket lessons. Enough to get started with the instructors easy to follow approach.

results.content: Overall a great course. The instructor is very thorough, without wasting time on a lot of fluff. The course is well laid out with a logical structure which I find pleasing. Good introduction to Socket.IO
results.content_html: Overall a great course. The instructor is very thorough, without wasting time on a lot of fluff. The course is well laid out with a logical structure which I find pleasing. Good introduction to Socket.IO
